newsitem.title: JAPAN: Sanyo says it,Corel to launch TV conference system.
newsitem.headline: Sanyo says it,Corel to launch TV conference system.

text.p: Sanyo Electric Co Ltd said on Tuesday that it and Canadian software house Corel Corp have jointly developed a television conference system to be sold for $500.
The new product, Corel Video Compression Camera, is expected to be launched in North America in August, a Sanyo spokesman said.
The spokesman said it was still undecided when the TV conference system would be marketed in Japan and whether Sanyo would cooperate in marketing.
The new system is less expensive than conventional systems mainly because it does not require separate equipment apart from the camera to digitalise video information, he said.
In Japan, Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Corp sells a TV conference system, Phoenix, for 190,000 yen ($1,652).
